One of a series of pamphlets issued in the controversy between Sutclife, Cartwright and Throckmorton. This is a response to: Matthew Sutcliffe. An answere unto a certaine calumnious letter published by M. Job Throkmorton, and entituled, A defence of J. Throkmorton against the slaunders of M. Sutcliffe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
